flawed_nl_solution:
The old budget was $75 because 15 x 5 = <<15*5=75>>75
They are adding $51 to the budget because 75 x 0.2 = <<75*0.2=51>>51
The new budget is $126 because 75 + 51 = <<75+51=126>>126
They can buy 14 softballs on the new budget because 126 / 9 = <<126/9=14>>14
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
